ModernizationTitle: Modernization of the National Innovation System of Uzbekistan
ModernizationText: On October 28, 2020, the World Bank Board of Directors approved the project 'Modernization of the National Innovation System of Uzbekistan' with the provision of funds in the amount of 50 million US dollars. The executive body of this project is the Ministry of Innovative Development (MID) of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
SystemTitle: The project has three main components
SystemText: Within the framework of Component 1 and Component 2, 5 grant programs will be developed in accordance with international standards and implemented. In addition, the project has Component 3 for comprehensive technical assistance for all sectors (government, universities and business) through consultation, capacity building.
